name: Bald Luigi's Crustmust Deluxe
summary:
Take a look into the history of Ralorche, the creator of Essence Of Waluigi with the definitive way to play his last Joke Game, Bald Luigi's Crustmust.

In Bald Luigi's Crustmust: Christmas has been canceled (for a basically obvious reason) and Santario, the biggest christmas fanboy is livid! He plans to kill literally everyone! As Bald Luigi, it is up to you to stop him, but little do you know that there is something strange going on behind the scenes......
